itemDisplayName: Deploy multiple VM Scale Sets of Linux VMs with Master/Slave architecture.
description: This template allows you to deploy multiple VM Scale Sets of Linux VMs with Master/Slave architecture. Master nodes with lower size of VMs and data node with higher size ( Based on Elastic Search as example ). Open to specify the numbers of master node and data node to adapt different architecture.
summary: This template allows you to deploy multiple VM Scale Sets of Linux VMs with Master/Slave architecture
